resources.string: Columbus was the first European to visit the Americas.
Canberra is the capital city of Australia.
Australia was the last continent to be \"discovered\" by the Europeans.
The water in the Great Lakes is salty.
Greenland is part of Northern America.
There are more countries in the EU than there are states in the USA.
Amsterdam is the capital city of Belgium.
The Pacific ocean is the largest ocean.
Mandarine is one of the least spoken languages in China.
Alaska became American in XVIII century.
